SH2 Napier Wairoa: Waikare bridge closures planned, new deck needed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/sh2-napier-wairoa-waikare-bridge-closures-planned-new-deck-needed/H5Z3T2BKLZASDFF4APR4IID27Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/sh2-napier-wairoa-waikare-bridge-closures-planned-new-deck-needed/H5Z3T2BKLZASDFF4APR4IID27Y/ Doug LaingTwo nights of closure will be needed for the work. Fri, 30 Aug 2024 02:21:48 +0000 The temporary Bridge over the Waikare River in use for the first time in May last year, in a blessing and ceremony marking a major point in the Cyclone Gabrielle recover - the opening of the highway to Napier-Wairoa traffic for the first time in three months. Photo / NZME
